structure.unit: ARTICLE XIIA. WORKFORCE HOUSING DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM

text.section:
Sec. 33-193.15. Penalties and enforcement.
This article shall be enforceable in accordance with the provisions of of this code. Violations of this article shall also be punishable by a fine not to exceed one thousand dollars ($1,000.00) or by imprisonment in the county jail for a period not to exceed sixty (60) days, or by both such fine and imprisonment, in the discretion of the county court. Any continuing violations of the provisions of this article may be enjoined and restrained by injunctive order of the circuit court in appropriate proceedings instituted for such purpose.
